attrs.name: prop
attrs.desc: Form field model. This attribute is mandatory when the validate and resetFields methods are used. The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is the field in the model of the Form component.

attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Label text; The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -

attrs.name: label-width
attrs.desc: Width of the form field label, for example, '50px'. Auto is supported. The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -

attrs.name: required
attrs.desc: Indicates whether this parameter is mandatory. If this parameter is not set, the parameter is automatically generated based on the verification rule. The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: rules
attrs.desc: Form validation rule; The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -

attrs.name: error
attrs.desc: Form field verification error information. If this parameter is set, the form verification status changes to error and the error information is displayed. The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -

attrs.name: show-message
attrs.desc: Whether to display verification error information; The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: inline-message
attrs.desc: The validation information is displayed in rows. The optional value of this attribute is -
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Controls the size of the component in the form field. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is null.

attrs.name: validate-position
attrs.desc: Specify the position where the verification dialog box is displayed. The value of this attribute can be top-start / top / top-end / left-start / left / left-end / right-start / right / right-end / bottom-start / bottom / bottom-end
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is top-end.

attrs.name: validate-type
attrs.desc: Verification type; The optional values of this attribute are tip / text
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is tip.

methods.name: resetField
methods.desc: Reset the table item to the initial value and remove the verification result.

methods.name: clearValidate
methods.desc: Remove the verification result of the table item.

events.name: validate
events.desc: This event is triggered after any form item is verified.
